welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Willistown, where small-town charm meets bustling city life. Known for its scenic beauty and rich history, we invite you to explore and experience all that our charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves as the primary hub for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Used by various airlines for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: Mainly used by Delta Airlines for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: Primarily used by international airlines for flights to and from Europe and Asia.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: Serves as the hub for Frontier Airlines and also handles domestic flights for other airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network 'PHL Free WiFi'.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for VIP and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
